name: Team - list (user does not have permissions)

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Team - list (user does not have permissions)
————————————————————————————
  1. Test by demoting an ordinary user to a guest, authenticating to the server via `mmctl` as that guest and then running the `mmctl team list` command.
inline.expectedResult: • You should see the error: "Error: : You don't have the appropriate permissions to list all teams"

customFields.Related ticket(s): System Admin cannot access the Teams menu of the System Console — MM-23221
